amendment.description: Amendment in section 1214(b)(1)(B)(ii) of title 5, United States Code, as proposed to be added by section 1(2) of the bill, strikes "shall" and inserts "may".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hice, Jody B. amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hice, Jody B..
